aboutpara: I'm Akshat Gandhi, a Full Stack Developer and aspiring System Architect passionate about solving complex problems. With a deep understanding of front-end and back-end technologies such as React, Node.js, and AWS, I specialize in building scalable systems and cloud-native applications. Whether it's optimizing web performance or designing robust APIs, I aim to deliver efficient, secure, and user-friendly solutions. Currently pursuing my B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering, I continuously explore new tools and technologies to stay on top of industry trends. My goal is to build products that not only perform well but also have a positive impact on users and businesses alike.
